Siblings Of Dementia Patients May Face Risk Of Shortened Lifespan, Even If They Are Not Diagnosed https://www.medicaldaily.com/siblings-dementia-病人-may-face-risk-shortened-lifespan-even-if-they-are-not-diagnosed-471188 Researchers found that a combination of genetics and environmental factors reduces longevity in dementia patients. Wasabi For Cognitive Health? Researchers Say It Could Improve Memory https://www.medicaldaily.com/wasabi-cognitive-health-researchers-say-it-could-improve-memory-471187 In a trial conducted in a small group of healthy participants above the age of 60, researchers found a "significant improvement" in short-term and long-term memory with the use of a supplement containing 6-MSITC, the main bioactive compound found in wasabi. https://www.medicaldaily.com/wasabi-cognitive-health-researchers-say-it-could-improve-memory-471187 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 06:06:01 -0500
